body.bibl: Gignoux, Philippe. “Titres et Fonctions Religieuses Sasanides d’après Les Sources Syriaques Hagiographiques.” In From Hecataeus to Al-Ḫuwārizmï: Bactrian, Pahlavi, Sogdian, Persian, Sanskrit, Syriac, Arabic, Chinese, Greek, and Latin Sources for the History of Pre-Islamic Central Asia, edited by Janos Harmatta, 191–203.
